name: Slug (William7772010)
description:
Slug is a game about passion, survival, and the endless joy of eating things.

Enjoy a multitude of 3 levels, each with unique assets. Great tunes and good times to be found in this Slug Game! Now featuring a real-life Artificial Intelligence system!

This game was made by me (https://william7772010.itch.io/) and Dylan (https://dhdylan.itch.io/)

Thank you very much for playing our game.
